snippet: A day after a Bronx judge freed David Bryant, who had been convicted in the death of an 8-year-old girl, the girl’s family was just starting to process what had happened.
abstract: Family of Karen Smith, 8-year-old Bronx girl who was murdered and raped in 1975, is outraged by convicted killer David Bryant's release from prison; meets with prosecutors, who will determine if they will appeal decision, retry case or dismiss charges.
lead_paragraph: A day after a Bronx judge freed David Bryant, who had been convicted in the death of an 8-year-old girl, the girl’s family was just starting to process what had happened.

headline.seo: After Conviction in ’75 Murder Is Thrown Out, a Victim’s Family Relives Its Pain
headline.main: After Conviction in ’75 Murder Is Thrown Out, Victim’s Family Relives Pain
headline.print_headline: After Conviction in ’75 Murder Is Thrown Out, Victim’s Family Relives Pain
